pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service

Class UserServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service.UserServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserService

    @Service
public class UserServiceImpl
extends Object
implements UserService
    Service Class for managing User objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur
